name: Drift Trikes UK - Complete Drift Trike
description:
**Please be advised these are custom made and are not an "off the shelf" item please contact us for details**

We will be supplying the trikes with all new BMX parts, not a selection of used parts.

We use BMX parts as they are easy to come by should something need replacing.

1 piece steel frame constructed from thick wall square tube.
Supplied unpainted so you can pick and choose your colour scheme.
 
BMX Forks 
BMX Front Wheel, Tyre & Tube 
BMX Stunt Pegs 
V Brake front brake
BMX Stem 
BMX Handlebars 
Kart wheels
Kart stub axles (17mm) 
Black sleeves 
Metal pan seat 

Collection is advised only due to its size and weight.
You can send your own courier if prefered.

They can be collected from us here in Buckinghamshire or we can deliver for the price of fuel contact us for details.

name: Driftstar Trikes -Rich Momma Frame
description: 2 Piece CAD designed frame made in Yorkshire, UK. Laser cut star braces. 17mm removable axles for go kart wheels fitted with nylock nuts. 1" 1/8 machined head tube. These are supplied raw (unpainted). You can have it powder coated red, blue, white or black for £40. Or you can have it painted in any colour for £30. The turn around time will vary for both of these options. Drift Star Trikes website

name: Drift Trikes UK - Frame
description:
**Please be advised these are custom made and are not an "off the shelf" item please contact us for details**

Constructed from 3mm wall box tubing.

Frames can be painted (Black or white, other colours by request) to keep costs down the frames will be supplied bare.

17mm axles for go kart wheels fitted with nylock nuts.

Please select what size head tube you need either 
1" or 1" 1/8.

Collection only or we can deliver for the price of fuel, due to the awkward size and shape.

We will happily add other parts, seats, wheels, tyres, sleeves to this as a combined package if you feel able to construct it when it arrives.

name: Drift Trikes UK - 17mm Stub Axles
description:
A pair of NEW 17mm steel stub axles.

Now we supply the axles with nylock nuts too.

Weld these to the rear of your trike to be able to fit front gokart wheels without changing bearings in the wheels!

These stub axles are designed to be inserted into a tube and welded, a washer or 2 may be needed to space the wheels accordingly.

These are sent directly from our supplier, if your buying these with wheels, these will arrive first.

**Free Postage to the UK**

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an accurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - Complete Rear Axle
description:
Drift Trikes UK bring you a new complete rear axle this has been thought out to accommodate all trikers.

610mm wide plus your wheel width.

The complete axle comes unpainted.
It comes with 16mm axles, this means you have the option of running sack barrow wheels or with Driftstar adapters you can run front kart wheels with 17mm bearings.

These axles have been tested and bend at 1.2 tons, nice to know isn't it!

This would need welding to the rear of your frame, if you have a Scream Machine, Huffy Slider or similar this will give you extra strength, extra width and allow the fitment of front gokart wheels with adapters.

**Free Postage to the UK**

These are sent directly from our supplier, please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an accurate shipping estimate.

name: Driftstar Trikes - 16mm - 17mm Wheel Spacers
description:
4 aluminium spacers made by Driftstar Trikes
Use these to allow the fitment of 17mm wheels on a 16mm axle.

These come in packs of 4
2 per wheel.

**Free Postage to the UK**

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an accurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - Kart Wheels, Tyres, Sleeves & Axles
description:
2 x New gokart wheels 
2 x New black sleeves 
2 x Used gokart tyres
2 x New stub axles (17mm)
2 x New M16 nylock nuts

Wheels come fitted with 17mm bearings and a valve.

These wheels are made in the UK should you have any issues they are easily returned.

3 and 5 spoke wheels offered as options.

**Free Postage to UK**

Wheels, tyres & sleeves are sent separately from the axles and nuts, this is to save damage to the wheels and axles going missing. There may be a day or two difference in when you receive your parts but both will have tracking numbers.

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an accurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - Kart Wheels, Tyres & Sleeves
description:
2 x New gokart wheels
2 x New black sleeves
2 x Used gokart tyres.

Wheels come fitted with 17mm bearings.

These wheels are made in the UK should you have any issues they are easily returned.

3 and 5 spoke wheels offered as options.

**Free Postage to UK**

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an accurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - Kart Wheels, Tyres & Axles
description:
2 x New gokart wheels
2 x Used kart tyres
2 x New stub axles (17mm)
2 x New M16 nylock nuts

Wheels come fitted with 17mm bearings and a valve.

These wheels are made in the UK should you have any issues they are easily returned.

3 and 5 spoke wheels offered as options.

**Free postage to the UK**

Wheels & tyres are sent separately from the axles and nuts, this is to save damage to the wheels and axles going missing. There may be a day or two difference in when you receive your parts but both will have tracking numbers.

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an accurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - Kart Wheels
description:
1 pair of Go Kart wheels to be run as Drift Trike rear wheels.
Wheels come fitted with valves and 17mm sealed bearings.

Ano splash by Driftstar Trikes. These wheels look great, every single wheel is a custom design and you have a few colours to choose from. Please email us prior to buying these, the time scales involved are about a week, but in busy periods could take longer.

The shipping for wheels and tyres is a lot higher than it is just for the wheels and this is reflected in the price.

**Free Postage to UK**

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an accurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - Kart Wheels - 3 Spoke
description:
1 pair of 3 spoke Go Kart wheels to be run as Drift Trike rear wheels.
Wheels come fitted with valves and 17mm sealed bearings.

The shipping for wheels and tyres is a lot higher than it is just for the wheels and this is reflected in the price.

**Free Postage to UK**

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an acurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - Kart Wheels - 5 Spoke
description:
1 pair of 5 spoke Go Kart wheels to be run as Drift Trike rear wheels.
Wheels come fitted with valves and 17mm sealed bearings.

The shipping for wheels and tyres is a lot higher than it is just for the wheels and this is reflected in the price.

**Free Postage to UK**

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an acurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - 250mm PE Sleeves
description:
1 Pair of black drift trike sleeves 

250mm external diameter, 7.7mm wall thickness. 
125mm wide, other widths available, please send us a message with your requirements.

Colour - Black.
Blue, Yellow and White are available, but due to the prolonged time suppliers take to ship them we only stock black.

To fit either 10" sack barrow wheels or front go kart wheels. 
They SHOULD also fit front tyres on rear kart rims, we have not tried this, just on advice from the USA they should fit.

Other widths are available, please use the contact us form.

**Free Postage to the UK**

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an accurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - Hollow Star Fangled Nut
description:
Hollow Star Fangled Nut

These handy headset tensioners keep your headset tight and stop your cable from getting tangled, sometimes unavoidable on the trikes!

These are new parts for 1" 1/8 forks.
These are available for 1" forks, but as a special order.

For A-head headset systems, if you have the old style stem there are stems available with a hollow center bolt.

**Free Postage to UK**

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an accurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - Sealed Bearing 1" 1/8 Aheadset
description:
This headset is a great part for your trike. 
Sealed bearings, colour coded headcap & crown race, free shipping and all for under £25.

Weight of headset 110g approx.
Size 1"1/8.
Colour Coded Alloy Top Cap.
Complete with Star nut and bolt.
CNC machined 6061/T6 alloy colour coded top and bottom cups.
Available in Blue, Red, Gold, Green and Purple.

**Free Postage to UK**

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an accurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - LockOn Grips
description:
We have ridden with grips that move for long enough, if your grips move then you know what we are talking about!

These lock at each end with a collar with an allen key to tighten them.

We will stock white to start with, but other colour collars are available.
All rubber grips are black.

**Free Postage to the UK**

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an accurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - 20" x 2.2" Tyre
description:
20" x 2.2"

Brand new street tyre with tread from rim edge to rim edge.
Side tread helps when the tyre is leant over during drifting.

**Free Postage to UK**

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an accurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - Pan Seat
description:
Metal pan seat.
Mounts via 4 bolts as seen in the picture.
Unpainted

These are shipped direct from our supplier with a tracking number

**Free Postage in the UK**

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an accurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - 17mm Gokart Wheel Bearings
description:
New sealed bearings for use in the kart wheels we sell.
They may well fit other wheels, but you will need to check to see if these will fit.

Sold in pairs so you dont have to buy 4 bearings if you only need enough for one wheel.

If you need bearings to do 2 wheels then you need 2 lots of these.

They will fit other kart wheels, The Jet wheels we sell have the same bearing size as some Freeline wheels I have but please check the size of the bearing recess on your wheels before ordering.

The bearings are sized like this
35mm (bearing recess in the wheel) x 10mm (height) x 17mm (axle size)

**Free Postage to the UK**

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an acurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - 1 x Used Kart Wheel
description:
1 flat face go kart wheel
110mm wide
New 17mm bearings.

I only have this rim at the moment but used rims come up quite often.

Can be fitted with a used tyre  or can be shipped as a bare rim.

Shipping prices will be higher with a tyre and so is reflected in the price.

**Free Postage to UK**

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an accurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - 2 x Used Kart Wheels
description:
2 Used Aluminium Kart Wheels
Fronts, 5 spoke, 1300mm wide

New 17mm bearings & new valves to give them the longest life possible.

These are used rims but they are in very good condition, if you buy them with tyres the tyres will be used ones but they will be tested to above the recommended pressure.
 
Can be fitted with used tyres and new sleeves if needed or can be shipped as bare rims.

Shipping prices will be higher with tyres and sleeves and so is reflected in the price.

**Free Postage to UK**

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an accurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - Logo Stickers
description:
White & Pink stocked, all other colours available as a special request.

120mm x 100mm

Pink & Black Sparkle are 

150mm x 120mm

**Free Postage in the UK**

name: Drift Trikes UK - Wheel Stickers
description:
Black only, other colours available as a custom order.

Designed to fit in the rim of all of our wheels but could be used wherever!

115mm x 15mm

Sold in pairs.

**Free Postage in the UK**

name: Drift Trikes UK - Sports Goggles
description:
Clear anti-scratch wide vision lens.
Thick comfort foam padding.
Silicone elasticated colour coded strap.
Replacement lens with tearoff pegs available in clear and iridium.
Tearoffs available (requires replacement visor)

**Free postage to the UK**

Please message us if your country is not one we provide a price for, we will need your area code to provide you with an acurate shipping estimate.

name: Drift Trikes UK - Lego Dust Caps
description:
Handmade Lego dust caps.

Made with brand new Lego 2x2 bricks.

Sold in packs of 3. I will happily mix and match colours.
Send via first class royal mail large letter.

Black dust caps used, grey are available.
Please email me if you prefer black or grey otherwise you could end up with a colour you didnt want.

For schrader valves only.

Colours available:
White
Black
Light Grey
Dark grey
Brown
Light Blue 
Dark Blue
Light Green
Dark green
Red
Yellow
Orange
Tan
Pink

Free postage to the UK
Sent via Royal Mail First Class

name: Quikoin - Coins & Key holder
description:
Fed up of your wallet not having anywhere for your coins?
Does your car sound like a charity coin collection?

This little rubber beauty all the way from USA will stop your change from falling out of your pocket, under the seat in the car or down the trails... lets face it, its crap getting to the cake shop to find you dropped all your coins!

Squeeze the ends together, open the slit and pop your coins/keys in, let it go and it seals back up keeping your shineys safe!

I fold notes up to go in here, saves getting your wallet out for a few quid in change!

**Free postage in the UK**

Please ask if your country is not listed, we ship internationally
